name: SUBDUE (DanadDMer)
description:
SUBDUE

Artist : DanadDMer

Experience a bizarre surreal Virtual Reality art for Oculus Quest.

THIS IS NOT A GAME but a surreal dream you can step into and experience.

Subdue is about our self imposed prison and our fear to step inside ourselves and face our demons. We often dare not take the leap of faith and often remain hanging and clinging to our old truth. We try to break away by forcefully hammering but instead reinforce our old belief system that keeps us imprisoned.

Virtual Reality art is still in it's infancy and more in experimentation phase. Therefore expect surprising unique experiences from each art work that will be published here regularly.
